Reviews.Title: hello
Reviews.Author: christy j smith
Reviews.Content: this is a pretty good cell phone, kind of small but does the job i need an more so all is good

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: Booda
Reviews.Content: this phone freezes the battery stops charging after about a year its terrible u can only have about 2 apps before the phone stops

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Genna Smith
Reviews.Content: This phone did not work at all. It did not come with the micro SD card or the book on the phone. It was a Christmas gift for my mom and she was sooooo sad we had to send it back. We talked to straight talk and Samsung and they tried to help and had great customer service. But in the end no body could get the phone working and we had to send it back and order a different phone.

Reviews.Title: straight talk phone.
Reviews.Author: emilyy17
Reviews.Content: This was my first andriod phone i was excited to finally get one. But this phone is not what i thought it would be. For starters the battery life was not good at all. The memory one that phone was almost pointless. I was always deleting pictures or messages to make room. If your memory gets to full you are unable to recive messages. The phone was also alot heavier then i thought it would be. After about two months the phobne wouldnt charge so i had to go get another phone. I would personally not reccomend this phone for anyone.

Reviews.Title: This version of Android sucks
Reviews.Author: Harmony Marie Hanrahan "Harmony M Hanrahan"
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but problems since I got this phone the memory in it isn't very big so it freezes up constantly. I can't have more than one app off of Google Apps because the memories just not big enough I am really unhappy with this phone and I I wouldn't recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Wrong battery
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Norman
Reviews.Content: I was sent the wrong battery for the phone. Everything else was in good shape, just the battery was for a different phone.

Reviews.Title: I like the phone, but I am haivng problems with it.
Reviews.Author: Liz Wiggim "lizard"
Reviews.Content: I really liked the phone at first.  However, I have had nonstop problems with it.  I have to do factory resets on the phone about once a week.  I don't know if it is the phone or the service, but am not happy with it at present time.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Nicki R.
Reviews.Content: He need it and it works for him for now and the service to get it to him, came early to him and thanks for this product
